meta.name: Haha, You Clowns
meta.description: Haha You Clowns follows three sweet natured brothers who, alongside their deeply caring father, embark on various adventures as they bond together in the wake of their mother's passing.

videos.title: Therapy
videos.overview: The boys get a cool new therapist.

videos.title: Improv
videos.overview: Tristan gets immersed in a new hobby.

videos.title: Call to the Battalion
videos.overview: The boys try to set Dad up on a date to find love.

videos.title: Movie Night
videos.overview: The boys try to figure out why Dad can't stay awake during movie night.

videos.title: Viral
videos.overview: The boys convince Dad to try and go viral during his weather report.

videos.title: Bomber Jacket
videos.overview: Preston loses his beloved World War II bomber jacket.

videos.title: Plane
videos.overview: Dad confronts his fear of flying on the way to Mexico.

videos.title: Duncan Holds a Baby
videos.overview: Duncan struggles to hide his fear of holding babies.

videos.title: Dad's Birthday
videos.overview: Dad's old friends are in town for his birthday, and they have quite the stories to tell.

videos.title: Hot Tub
videos.overview: The boys beg Dad to let them get a hot tub.
